apaleo.ClientId: Your apaleo clientId. You can define an environment variable called 'APALEO__CLIENTID'
apaleo.ClientSecret: Your apaleo client secret. You can define an environment variable called 'APALEO__CLIENTSECRET'

IntegrationConfig.IntegrationBaseAddress: The public URL of your Integration. You can define an environment variable called 'APALEO__INTEGRATIONCONFIG__INTEGRATIONURL'
IntegrationConfig.IntegrationIconUrl: The Url to your integration icon. You can define an environment variable called 'APALEO__INTEGRATIONCONFIG__INTEGRATIONICONURL'
IntegrationConfig.IntegrationLabel: The text label you want to show for instance of the tabs in the apaleo UI. You can define an environment variable called 'APALEO__INTEGRATIONCONFIG__INTEGRATIONLABEL'
IntegrationConfig.DefaultIntegrationCode: This is the default code to identify your integration. It should consist of uppercase letters. You can define an environment variable called 'APALEO__INTEGRATIONCONFIG__DEFAULTINTEGRATIONCODE'

S3.BucketName: Your amazon S3 BucketName. You can define an environment variable called 'STORAGE__S3__BUCKETNAME'
S3.Region: The region of the bucket. You can define an environment variable called 'STORAGE__S3__REGION'

DATABASE_URL_COMMENT: DATABASE_URL is a variable provided by heroku but not in a npgsql friendly format, that's why it requires extra care. Keep the empty definition below
